original_title: Die Firma - Das Ministerium f√ºr Staatssicherheit
overview: Under the control of the Stasi East Germany was the most repressive police state in the history of the world. Yet it managed to convince the West that it was being progressive. Here is the story of how the Stasi gained control over the lives of the East German people and the methods it used.
title: Stasi East Germany's Secret Police
